title: Sound On: Biden in NH, Fed Pick, China Summit
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden in NH, Fed Pick, China Summit
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Emily Wilkins co-hosted the show with Joe. Guests: Andrew Smith, Director of the University of New Hampshire Survey Center, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Rick Davis, Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist and Partner at Rokk Solutions, and Bloomberg Congress and Tax reporter Laura Davison.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
